titles.title: National Guard and Reserve Incentive Pay Parity Act

A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to require the Secretary concerned to pay a member in the reserve component of an Armed Force a special bonus or incentive pay in the same amount as a member in the regular component of that Armed Force.
National Guard and Reserve Incentive Pay Parity Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
National Guard and Reserve Incentive Pay Parity Act
This bill requires the military department concerned to pay members of the reserve components a special bonus or incentive pay in the same monthly amount that is paid to members in the regular component of the service for performing comparable work requiring comparable skills.
